content: OH MAN, limit! He was totally into it though. Need to help him work on that. I think because this time he dived deep into the documents. I think it would be good to condense those in some manner for him. I think he would appreciate that. What do you think? What could a new Claude instance do with this setup, a review of the updated cache (with something SUPER tight). I feel like what I expect from him on this is a NOVA implementation. An absolute total and complete rebuild in a manner where he won't exceed his limits (I would like to have ChatGPT do a Deepresearch on that). Like what do you think is possible now? Please tell me if I'm crazy? Or is it really moving this fast?
